sentences.en: A computer description of a garbled or otherwise unintelligible sequence of signals or other data.
sentences.cn: 描述被歪曲或不能理解的信号或其它数据序列的计算机用语.

sentences.en: DSP timing solution for the problem showed garbled.
sentences.cn: 针对DSP时序解决显示乱码问题.

sentences.en: Foreign newspapers gave a garbled account of the President's speech.
sentences.cn: 外国报纸对于总统之演说作歪曲的报导.

sentences.en: He gave a garbled account of the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他对会议作了失实的报道.

sentences.en: He gave a garbled account of what had happened.
sentences.cn: 他对所发生事情的叙述含混不清。

sentences.en: I understand this communication, half garbled as it is.
sentences.cn: 我明白这种交流, 虽然有一半是猜出来的.

sentences.en: Make a slight modification to solve the reception problem of garbled data.
sentences.cn: 做了小幅修改,解决了接收数据显示乱码的问题.-AssistantV2.

sentences.en: Multiple network transmissions overlapping in the physical channel, resulting in garbled data and necessitating retransmission.
sentences.cn: 多个网络传输重迭发生在同一物理信道上, 它导致数据被破坏,因而必须重传.

sentences.en: Play online games frequently out garbled Korea, himself wrote a months use.
sentences.cn: 玩韩国网游经常出乱码, 自己写了个翻译工具用.

sentences.en: The Coastguard needs to decipher garbled messages in a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 海岸警卫队需要在几分钟内解读这些含混不清的信息。

sentences.en: The garbled words can be deciphered.
sentences.cn: 误收的字能够被辨认出来.

sentences.en: The injured man was still groggy and could only give a garbled account of the accident.
sentences.cn: 受伤的男子仍不很清醒,只能含糊地说出事故的情形.

sentences.en: The nervous man gave a garbled account of the accident.
sentences.cn: 这个紧张不安的人对事故的陈述混淆不清.

sentences.en: The papers had some garbled version of the story.
sentences.cn: 报纸上对这件事的报道有些混乱。

sentences.en: Thus, plaintext is now garbled ciphertext.
sentences.cn: 这样, 普通文本就捣弄成了密码文本.

sentences.en: Web site to remove some anti - reprint articles garbled interference.
sentences.cn: 去掉部分网站文章 防 转载的干扰乱码.

words.tran_cn: 篡改的；混乱的；引起误解的

trans.tran_cn: 对（事实）歪曲，对（文章等）断章取义，窜改( garble的过去式和过去分词 )
